thread.title: T.O.

author: T.O.
title: T.O.
text: I bought tickets for homewood ski resort near tahoe. a huge storm closed the resort the day before i arrived. when i arrived they were open with about 10% of the mountain, but ski lessons were closed which i had bought for my daughters. homewood let me change the date of the ski lessons, but liftopia would not let me change my lift ticket. they said the resort is open and that's all they need to keep my money. these people's business model is to use any excuse to keep your money. i don't like organizations like that. i understand money is important, but i hope that enough people giving them bad reviews for this behavior will cause them to lose enough money that they change.
